outputs.output_descr:
1. GHG baseline assessment on priority sectors conducted, investment plan prepared 
2. CRGE   mainstreamed into the national and sub-national development planning, cooperation,  budgeting and M&E
3. Ethiopian national CRGE facility established and operationalized 
4.  CRGE planning, coordination and implementation capacity in the Ministry of Agriculture developed
5. CRGE implementation capacity at the federal Ministry Of Water and Energy developed
6.  CRGE implementation capacity at the federal Ministry Of Industry developed
